variations.template: When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it.

variations.template: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it. Each copy becomes a token.

variations.template: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, they may copy it. If they do, they choose an opponent to also copy it. Players may choose new targets for their copies.
